headline.main: The Effort To Prevent Cancer Moves To New Stage

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: TENS of thousands of people here and abroad are taking nutrient supplements in unusual experiments that, if successful, would usher in a new era in the war against cancer: chemoprevention.
